post.body: I have read something about it from @davidfeng What are the details---where/when?
Sorry, here is the direct link to Qwitter. It will be easier then searching through the other article http://tinyurl.com/6z85np
Here is what you want http://tinyurl.com/69kzkk
quick subject change---are fireworks permitted in the city this year for Chinese New Year? Within the 5th Ring Road
Not sure about that but I have a lot of respect for him. He is very capable and an extremely nice guy. We tried very hard to keep him
He still remains a significant shareholder of Mofile and a consultant
He left Mofile in Jan/Feb 2008.
@christinelu who were the firms?
I should qualify that by saying the sounding out of the Foreign Cos was in early Dec. Things may have changed since then
Agree. Big concern is royalty rate PRC Cos would have to pay to foreign firms for use of non-PRC 3G Tech. China has been burned once
@DanHarris International School of Beijing spoke to For. cos. w/most students at the school. None had plans to reduce expat staffing
Yes. I also believe we will be seeing walls of protectionism erected around the world with various Govt stimulus packages as excuses
23/100. Thought I would do better. Several books I own but have not read. Does it count if I saw the movie?
For a man of your grace and stature you should have nothing but an iPhone. I will have a word with David Stern in the morning.....
Management should be spending Sundays at their country homes plotting more ways to exploit workers
The operative phrase in your statement is: "allows them to let staff work...."
you should be banned from Twitter because of your pro-Sunday work statements.......
RT @rcormack: "Facebook is about people you used to know; Twitter is about people you'd like to know better." http://bit.ly/BrPK
finding it ironic that Hillary will be Sec. of State and Bill Richardson, who played Judas and supported Obama, will now be out in the cold
Reading: Will foreign firms get a slice of China's 3G stimulus? http://tinyurl.com/8xtxhq
